# Stewart Manor (Charles B. Sommers House)

| locmapin = USA Indianapolis#Indiana#USA
| built = -1924
| architect = Knowton, Bass & Company
| builder = Bedford Stone & Construction
| added = October 8, 1976
| area =

Stewart Manor (Charles B. Sommers House) is a historic home located at Indianapolis, Indiana.  It was built in 1923â€“1924, and is a large -story, irregularly massed stone mansion.  It features a drive through front portico and rounded and segmental arched openings. The house has a shingled gable roof with rounded corners reminiscent of a medieval English country manor.
It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1976.
